name: Life On Cards
description:
Life on Cards: Make every day choices and try to keep your life stable. Navigate procedural events rendered on 52 unique handcrafted cards.  Take care to balance your money, happiness, social relationships and health. Watch out for the instability cards which ruin your life despite your efforts . Good luck, you are going to need it!

Submited for Ludum Dare 49 Game Jam!
